localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Gawq unravels echo chambers by serving you algorithm-free news, hyper-focused on transparency, social impact and unbiased reporting. Compare the news, mute the noise, and read between the headlines from over 150+ media sources daily.
blogPost.body: Gawq unravels echo chambers by serving you algorithm-free news, hyper-focused on transparency, social impact and unbiased reporting. Compare the news, mute the noise, and read between the headlines from over 150+ media sources daily.
blogPost.title: Gawq - Unbreaking news. Stay informed, mindfully.
blogPost.author: Joshua Dziabiak

localize.description: Gawq通过为您提供无算法的新闻、高度关注透明度、社会影响和公正的报道来揭开回声室的面纱。比较新闻，让噪音静音，并从每天超过150个媒体来源的标题之间阅读。
localize.tagline: 突破性的新闻。掌握信息，心中有数。

localize.description: Gawq通過爲您提供無算法的新聞、高度關注透明度、社會影響和公正的報道來揭開回聲室的面紗。比較新聞，讓噪音靜音，並從每天超過150個媒體來源的標題之間閱讀。
localize.tagline: 突破性的新聞。掌握信息，心中有數。

previous.excerpt: Tailscale is a zero config VPN for building secure networks. Install on any device in minutes. Remote access from any network or physical location. Built on WireGuard®.
previous.title: Tailscale - A secure network that just works

localize.description: Tailscale是一个零配置的VPN，用于构建安全网络。在几分钟内安装在任何设备上。从任何网络或物理位置远程访问。建立在WireGuard®上。
localize.tagline: 一个安全的网络，只是工作

localize.description: Tailscale是一個零配置的VPN，用於構建安全網絡。在幾分鐘內安裝在任何設備上。從任何網絡或物理位置遠程訪問。建立在WireGuard®上。
localize.tagline: 一個安全的網絡，只是工作

next.excerpt: OpenReel empowers distributed enterprise, media, entertainment, and agency teams to remotely control, direct, script, film, and collaborate on high definition video projects from a mobile device or webcam in over 125 countries
next.title: OpenReel - Simple remote video production

localize.description: OpenReel使分布式企业、媒体、娱乐和代理团队能够在超过125个国家通过移动设备或网络摄像头对高清视频项目进行远程控制、导演、编剧、拍摄和协作。
OpenReel使分佈式企業、媒體、娛樂和代理團隊能夠在超過125個國家通過移動設備或網絡攝像頭對高清視頻項目進行遠程控制、導演、編劇、拍攝和協作。
